name: Castle Defense Battles
description:
Castle Defense requires strategic thinking and tactical timing to defend your Castle from an onslaught of evil monsters.

How to play

Defend your Castle from hordes of monsters. Put archers on the walls, and soldiers on the attack line, and use potions and magic to defend your Castle. Upgrade and unlock new soldiers, improve the Castle and abilities.

FEATURE:

- Epic defense battles that will hook you for hours!
- Addictive game-play
- 100 challenging levels
- Battle many different types of enemy invaders, requiring varying tactics to defeat
- Extensive magic system
- Various upgrades
